summary:
two Versions of THAIDEN the COMPANION available: New Follower (Jorrvaskr/Whiterun) or as Replacer for Stenvar (Candlehearth Hall/Windhelm)

[b]V2 > includes a unique HD-SteelArmor and Greatsword created by CaBaL120[/b], Thaiden is essential & available for Marriage!
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1775/43105628475_52041bcf17_o.jpg[/img]

[center][size=5]V2: includes a unique + improved HD SteelArmor-Set and Greatsword for Thaiden[/size]

[size=4]My dear friend [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/571605]CaBaL120[/url][/b] created fantastic custom Retextures to make [b]Thaiden's SteelArmor[/b] and [b]Thaiden'sThorn[/b] truely special items! Both the Armor-Set and the Greatsword have slightly improved stats to make sure Thaiden is well protected on all his Skyrim-Adventures![/size][/center]
[b]IMPORTANT UPDATE INFOs[/b] >>> updating from ThaidenV1 to ThaidenV2 should work flawlessly! Both Thaiden-files are now ESP-files!
[size=2](if you have the Stenvar-replacing Version installed make sure that after the Update only the [b]esp-file (=V2)[/b] remains in your data-folder! > delete ZZZ_Stenvar_Replacer_THAIDEN.[b]esm[/b] if it is still there)!
Because I did not really change anything on Thaiden himself (only increase his maximum-level from 80 to 100) it is also possible to just install the new optional [b]"Thaiden'sTreasureChest"[/b] to get the new Armor and Greatsword for him ;)!
[/size]
[center]
[size=3][color=lightgreen]If you like Thaiden > please leave a comment > [b]He wants to see your name on his list![/b] :D
... and I really appreciate your feedback and support! :)[/color][/size][/center]
[img]https://c2.staticflickr.com/8/7607/27161943622_3b8c137fcd_o.gif[/img]
[img]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1819/43963236912_2521a3df53_o.jpg[/img]

[size=4]Compatibility[/size]
Both versions of [b]Thaiden the Companion[/b] should be compatible with nearly ALL other mods - even Follower overhauls like Better Followers, UFO,...!
All you have to do is [b]make sure to load my esp-file AFTER all other companion mods[/b]! Mine is merely a simple texture replacer for Stenvars face and a completly new Follower - so the possibilty of conflicts is practically zero!

[size=4]INSTALLATION[/size] >>> Download manually or with the NMM.
Manual Installation: Unrar, place the data folder in your main Skyrim directory.

[img]https://c6.staticflickr.com/8/7307/27189740061_9fa564c89b_o.jpg[/img]
[size=4]Face-Textures[/size]
[b]I highly recommend that you use Geonox's amazing Face-Textures for Men [/b] - not only are they "essential" for Thaidens look
- but they also highly improve all other males in your game! THE BEST MALE FACE-TEXTURES AVAILABLE IMHO - really a MUST HAVE! :D
There are 3 possibilities to download them on the Nexus (choose one of them):

[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]Faces - GeonoxFaces[/url] (including smooth option + Coverkhajiits) >>> the recommended "Better Males" Version[/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13888]Geonox Male Face - Blackbugfix[/url] (smooth version) >>> a [b]lower resolution Version[/b] for all people with medium/lower end machines
- the textures still look great (the original Geonox-Textures are insanly big!) - there are 3 different texture-sizes available!
This makes it possible to enjoy them without having to fear the "Black-face-bug" - no matter how old your computer is! :)

([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4141]High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox[/url] (+ optional smooth Maps) >>> the original file by Geonox)


[size=3][b]Skin-Textures + Male Body Replacer[/b][/size]

>>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]BetterMales Underwear - Slip[/url]

or if you prefer naked males - I recommend >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]BetterMales - BodiesNudes - SundraconMeshes[/url]

both include several body-hair-options - read the description carefully and install your favorite skintexture! :)


[size=3][b]Eyes[/b][/size] >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]Covereyes[/url] - or any other HD-Eye-retextures (as long as they don't drastically change the grey eyecolor!)

[size=3][b]Hair[/b][/size] >>> Thaiden's hairstyle is vanilla but I use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4307]AOF Believable Hair -Female and Male-[/url] for a better hair texture/structure
[img]https://c5.staticflickr.com/8/7044/27161936532_a87d5525a7_o.jpg[/img]
[size=4][b]Alternative Outfit[/b][/size]
If you like the outfit Thaiden is wearing in some of my older images you can get the items here:
(the Outfit is not included in my files - you need download them and dress him yourself!) ;)

[b]Barbarian Armor[/b] >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1973]Immersive Armors[/url] (or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6684]Lore Friendly Armor Pack[/url])
[b]Boots, Gauntlets, Fur Hood[/b] >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12693]Einherjar Armor[/url] (Sons of Skyrim Armor)
[b]Cave Bear Cloak[/b] >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13486]Winter Is Coming - Cloaks[/url]
[b]Dragonbone Amulet[/b] >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8361]Expanded Jewelry Crafting[/url]
[b]Bandolier[/b] >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16438]Bandolier - Bags and Pouches[/url] (tight male version!)



[size=4][b]Other Important Infos + Mods[/b][/size]

[b]To fully enjoy Thaiden and all your other followers I highly recommend [size=3][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14037]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url][/size]![/b]
Some of its features are: New dialog-options (stats, level-up, inventory acceccs,...), Riding + Horses, group commands,
higher follower limit,... and many more! :D
(make sure to load Thaidens esp-file AFTER any follower-tweak/improvement-mods)

My [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11371]Whiter Teeth[/url] Mod improves all teeth, tusks, tongues and fangs in Skyrim - and gives them a more natural and healthy appearance!
(especially important for all Orcs, Argonians, Vampires and Werewolfs!) :)

[b]ENB[/b] used in all my Screenshots >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12549]Jasmin 4,6 Real Graphic ENB[/url]

Very nice two-handed animation replacer >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16351]YY Anim Replacer - Zweihander[/url] (I used this poses in some of my images)



[b]If you like Thaiden soo much that you don't want him as companion - but instead prefer him as player-character >>> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7581]Thaiden - Level 1 SAVEGAME[/url][/b]

<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
[img]https://c6.staticflickr.com/8/7703/27189739701_6edd9d33b6_o.jpg[/img]
A BIG THANK YOU to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3764143]FalmerBane[/url] - [b]the Master of companion-creation[/b] - for his help, patience and assistance in creating the non-replacing Thaiden-Version! Make sure to check out his wonderful followers!

[img]https://c2.staticflickr.com/8/7290/26653506793_2e942448a0_o.jpg[/img]
[img]https://c3.staticflickr.com/8/7290/27161943962_752a768740_o.jpg[/img]
Once you have met/hired Thaiden (Stenvar-Replacer-Version) you need to manually fix a gap in his neck (which occurs on most NPC-replacers)
[b]You only need to do this ONCE - from then on it stays fixed (throughout that playthrough)![/b] :)

First - open the game console (click the tilde key ~ right above TAB)

once the console is open - click on Thaiden with your mouse (you should now see some numbers in the console)

now type in: [color=lightgreen]setnpcweight 90[/color] and press enter!

close the console by clicking the tilde key again

>>> The neck-seam is fixed now - but Thaiden has lost his warpaint + "makeup" because of this procedure - no need to worry
all you need to do now is SAVE your game and RESTART it! All should work perfectly from then on!
[center]
<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<
